description.content-start: inCursor Technology and Consulting LLC We started our adventure in 2022 with the aim of transforming our professional knowledge into solution techniques that will meet the sectoral needs by coming together with a group of engineers from different fields with five to twenty years of experience in the public and private sectors.
description.content-center: By displaying an interdisciplinary approach in our work, we offer up-to-date, technological and smart solutions. We aim to provide added value to our rapidly developing country in the technological field by blending the excitement of the first day and years of experience with our products and services for many sectors from education to health, from agriculture to art with our founders, each of whom is an expert in their own field and has proven their competence in both academic and professional terms, and to provide creative and originality to our partners. We aim to develop solutions.
description.content-end: Our corporate goal in the field of software, robotics, data science and digital transformation in which we operate, In the short term, partnering with well-known and visionary companies in the region, Contributing to national technological development by participating in large projects across the country in the medium term, Becoming a national brand in the long term and taking part in international projects. is to be a company.
description.slogan: “intelligent Current solution origin” / “Akıllı, Güncel Çözüm Kaynağı”
